articles.title: Chrome users: This is Google Duo's group video chat and it's coming soon - ZDNet
articles.description: Google Duo brings group video calls to the web in Chrome, as Google works to simplify its communications apps.
articles.content:
With people practicing social distancing during the coronavirus pandemic Google's latest effort to boost video-conference capabilities brings group calling on its Duo app to the web. 
Duo, which launched in 2016, was originally only for mobile platforms. The… [+2830 chars]

articles.description: Microsoft Outlook will get a Gmail-like text prediction feature in May while the Send later feature will come in Q2 this year, which means by the end of June.
